value.name: Protesters march to Oklahoma County Courthouse to demand justice for Isaiah Lewis
value.description: Dozens of people gathered Monday near Kerr Park to march to the Oklahoma County District Attorney’s Office, demanding justice for Isaiah Lewis.

video.name: Protesters march to Oklahoma County Courthouse to demand justice for Isaiah Lewis

value.name: Protesters call on DA to reopen Isaiah Lewis case
value.description: About a hundred people marched downtown calling for justice for Isaiah Lewis. The Collegiate Freedom and Justice Coalition organized the event, saying they’re honoring Lewis, bringing awareness to his case,

value.name: Group shows support for 7 arrested during protest at DA Prater's office
value.description: An event organized by the Collegiate Freedom and Justice Coalition began Monday as a march from Kerr Park to the Oklahoma County District Attorney’s office.

value.name: OSU football: Chuba Hubbard says he's leaving social media, calls it 'a playground for hate'
value.description: Hubbard called for the resignation of David Prater on Monday and deleted his account hours later, only to reactivate it Tuesday afternoon
